output_data.clarification_question: Please specify the total time spent (start to finish, including counseling/therapy and E/M components) for this established patient visit. Time is required to distinguish between 90834 (45 min) or 90837 (60 min) or the corresponding E/M level.
output_data.suggested_answer: 53 minutes or more (supporting 90837 or 99214/99215 level coding) is suggested given the detailed risk assessment, counseling, and high complexity medication management (titration of *Sertraline*).

primary_code.description: Established patient E/M and Psychotherapy services (Code determined by documented duration)
primary_code.rationale: The session involved integrated Evaluation and Management (medication titration: increasing *Sertraline* from 50mg to 100mg) and Psychotherapy (detailed assessment of depressive symptoms, grief/guilt, and passive suicidal ideation). The final primary code (99214/99215 or 90834/90837) hinges entirely on documented time.

output_data.medical_necessity: High medical decision complexity supported by new dose titration of an SSRI for *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate* (F33.1) coupled with assessment and management of passive suicidal ideation.
